scripts.postinstall: [ ! -d "node_modules/ethereum-sourcify/dist" ] && (cd node_modules/ethereum-sourcify && npx lerna bootstrap && npx lerna run build) || true
scripts.sourcify:run: export REPOSITORY_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5500/ && export SERVER_PORT=8990 && export REPOSITORY_PATH="$(pwd)/data/repository" && export DATABASE_PATH="$(pwd)/data/database" && cd node_modules/ethereum-sourcify/ && node ./dist/server/server.js & npx http-server -s -p 5500 ./data/repository
